Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (left < right) {  	mid = (left + right) / 2;  	// Divide the array into two halves until we have an array  	// of one element' because a one-element array is considered  	// sorted  	SortArray (numbers' left' mid);  	SortArray (numbers' mid + 1' right);  	MergeArrays (numbers' left' mid + 1' right);  }
The following statement contains a magic number: mid = (left + right) / 2;
